metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11408 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
The security handlers in the Security component in Symfony in 2.7.x before2.7.48, 2.8.x before 2.8.41, 3.3.x before 3.3.17, 3.4.x before 3.4.11, and4.0.x before 4.0.11 have an Open redirect vulnerability whensecurity.http_utils is inlined by a container.  NOTE: this issue existsbecause of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-16652.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-symfony - 3.4.15+dfsg-2ubuntu4
php-symfony-amazon-mailer - 3.4.15+dfsg-2ubuntu4
php-symfony-asset - 3.4.15+dfsg-2ubuntu4

criterions.comment: symfony package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.15+dfsg-2ubuntu4').
